title: Stylish Port Moresby Apartment Escape with Panoramic Harbour Views
description: The modern and sophisticated Crowne Plaza Residences Port Moresby, an IHG Hotel, sits in the heart of the CBD just moments from the newly developed Ela Beach and Harbour Waterfront. From this central location, take a stroll along Stanley Esplanade, head out and explore the town or pay your respects at the Bomana War Cemetery. When youâ€™re not exploring the nearby attractions, dine at the bright and airy PORT Terrace Restaurant & Bar or perhaps work out in the state-of-the-art gym.
